text: Aziz Aslimanesh (; 9 April 1938 - 23 April 2015), better known as Aziz Asli, was an Iranian football goalkeeper, manager, painter, and actor. He played for teams such as Persepolis F.C. and his country from the late 1940s until the early 1970s. He managed Zob Ahan Isfahan F.C. for a short time. He also acted in movies before the Islamic Revolution. Asli was born in Tabriz. He was of Azerbaijani ancestry. He died on 23 April 2015 in Munich, Germany, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Team Melli stats Category:1938 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Germany Category:Football managers Category:Iranian actors Category:Iranian association football goalkeepers Category:Movie actors
title: Aziz Asli
